name: Pity Party
description:
Hi there! My name is Martina and I am a first semester Game Design student. This is my Game Art semester project. 

Pity Party is the first version of a point-and-click puzzle game, kind of a tribute to Rusty Lake's Cube Escape series. 

The product is far from being its final and definitive version, it has many minor issues, but I'd love to get feedback in order to fix and improve my work.

If you will try this game, thank you a lot! This is so important to me. <3

I'm looking forward to get your feedback. Please, get in touch!
